scripts.build: npm run clean & set NODE_ENV=production & nui-tools build -o dist .
scripts.build-cf2: npm run clean & set NODE_ENV=production & nui-tools build -o dist .
scripts.start: npm run clean & set NODE_ENV=development && node --max_old_space_size=2048 node_modules/nui-tools/src/index.js build --dev -w -o dist .
scripts.start:cse: npm run clean & set NODE_ENV=development & set DEV_MODULE=cse & nui-tools build --dev -w -o dist .
scripts.eslint: nui-tools eslint checkstyle stylish html tap -o ./reports/eslint -i ./dist/**/*.eslint.json
